short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LOL: Weekly (List of Lit) Links and Things Sharer/Curator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LOL Google Chrome Extension is supplement for LOL Weekly Curated Lit/Art Newsletter that runs on https://tinyletter.com/gdad-s-river. This extension enables (encouraged) all of the people (although targeted for subscribers) to share the links that they read or visit in a week, so that I could include them in the coming issues. This chrome extension enables a person to sign in through their facebook/twitter/google account and click on the "LOL" blue icon (which automatically should come in your Chrome toolbar once you install this extension)
